Html:
I am new to this control. All I am reading sounds great, so I am excited to get started on this. Downloaded the source code and tried to use Demo.WindowsForms however it does not compile. 

Is the demo project behind the current release or am I missing something?

Johannes

this is latest changeset build http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/releases/view/73162#DownloadId=311431

build fine as all other, i don't commit uncompilable code

hi radioman,

as said, I thought I might be missing something. I had downloaded "greatmaps_96b9719bceb9" which includes the windows form demo as source code. Loading it in VS 2008 and using the dlls from the stable release gives all sorts of errors, HOWEVER I now downloaded "greatmaps_dbfffa5b4adc" which is associated with the stable build and all works fine!

Thanks for your help!

Johannes
solution for VS 2008 contains mobile version which is not in sync always, just disable mobile project
